mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REPORT ( REPORT_ID, STATION_ID, USER_ID, REPORT_TYPE_CD, REPORT_COMMENT, STATE, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPORT.NEXTVAL, #{stationId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{reportTypeCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportComment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N', SYSDATE, #{userId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYSDATE, #{userId, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.REPORT_TYPE_CD AS codeDetailId, b.code_detail_name AS codeDetailName, COUNT(*) AS count FROM TB_REPORT a JOIN tb_code_d b ON a.report_type_cd = b.code_detail_id WHERE STATION_ID = #{stationId, jdbcType=NUMERIC} GROUP BY a.REPORT_TYPE_CD, b.code_detail_name
